summary: In this conversation, the customer was looking to upgrade their Contoso Wireless internet service and the agent provided information about the various upgrade packages offered, including the Enhanced Plus Internet plan which provides up to 100 Mbps download speeds and up to 10 Mbps upload speeds. The agent also explained the various discounts available, such as automatic payment discounts and bundling discounts, as well as the customer support services and satisfaction guarantee offered by Contoso Wireless. Finally, the agent provided instructions on how to upgrade the customer's service.
